title: Hungary: Citi Named 'Primary Dealer of the Year in 2011' by ÁKK
summary: Budapest - Citi Hungary was named `Primary Dealer of the Year in 2011' by the Hungarian Government Debt Management Agency (AKK). In addition to this accolade, Citi Hungary's Markets team was named market leader in the category `primary dealer with the most dynamic growth of primary market share in 2011.'
tag-1: Hungary: Citi Named 'Primary Dealer of the Year in 2011' by ÁKK
tag-2: Budapest – Citi Hungary was named `Primary Dealer of the Year in 2011' by the Hungarian Government Debt Management Agency (AKK). In addition to this accolade, Citi Hungary's Markets team was named market leader in the category `primary dealer with the most dynamic growth of primary market share in 2011.'
tag-3: Batara Sianturi, Citi Country Officer for Hungary, said: "As part of a unique global institution with an unmatched 200-year history, global network and expertise, Citi has been a longstanding partner of the Hungarian government in attracting international investors from around the globe and supporting its endeavor to gain access to financing solutions from capital markets. We very much appreciate this award through which AKK is recognizing Citi Hungary's outstanding overall performance in the sovereign debt market in 2011."
tag-4: "Winning this honor based on a number of measures, including primary market share, repo activity with the debt management agency, buyback auction activity and secondary market turnover, is a reinforcement of our commitment to the sovereign debt market and our clients in Hungary," added Roman Kovac, Head of Markets in Hungary.
tag-5: Primary dealers play a key role in providing sovereign financing for the central budget. AKK continuously monitors and controls primary dealers' performance, and uses an annual league-table consisting of various categories to recognize the best performers. AKK launched this award program in 1997.
tag-6: More information about Citibank Hungary's products and services is available at www.citibank.hu.
tag-7: Citibank Hungary With more than a 25-year history of presence, ingenuity and leadership in Hungary, today, Citibank Hungaryoperates as a unique global bank providing large corporate, small and middle enterprises and individual clients with a wide range of world-class, leading-edge innovative products and services. These include global transactions services, securities and fund services, corporate and investment banking services, treasury services, wealth management, investment products, cards, insurances and loans. The highly skilled team of Citigold personal bankers provides outstanding private banking services to affluent individuals. Citibank Hungary's diversified distribution channels consist of 26 branches across major cities in Hungary, 24/7 CitiPhone banking, Citibank Online internet banking and direct sales/telesales channels. Citibank Hungary's Zero Fee Bank Account for the fourth consecutive year was voted as the Best Bank Account Award in the 2011 MasterCard - Bank of the Year Competition.
tag-8: Additional information may be found at www.citibank.hu | Facebook: www.facebook.com/CitibankMagyarorszag
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
